snippet.title: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Switch Announcement - May 7th 2020
snippet.description:
You asked for it and finally "Lonely Mountains: Downhill" finds it's way to the Nintendo Switch - starting on May 7th, 2020! Are you ready? 

Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/lonely-mountains-downhill-switch/
Steam: http://lonelymountains.com/steam
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/lonely-mountains-downhill/9mv6mcvlt8gr
PS4: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/lonely-mountains-downhill-ps4/
Talk to the devs on Discord: https://discord.gg/lonelymountains
